author: Simon Difford
description: A smooth creamy orangey dessert cocktail that is surprisingly boozy and far from overly sweet. However, be warned, it is thick and rich - just as a dessert cocktail should be.
name: Orange Custard Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
